official.headline: Citywide Assemblies Launch
official.anchor_line: Stenograd hosts citywide public assemblies, giving citizens the opportunity to share and reflect on personal histories.
official.contextual_reframing: The BCI's facilitation of open forums demonstrates the city's commitment to rational, collective problem-solving.

official.headline: Transparent Scoring Debuts
official.anchor_line: Honesty and empathy scores are displayed live during district forums, promoting meaningful dialogue across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Real-time scoring encourages trust and civic engagement, reinforcing our evidence-based community values.

official.headline: Voices Shape Record
official.anchor_line: Citizens’ testimonies are integrated into the evolving digital record, deepening Stenograd’s commitment to collective truth.
official.contextual_reframing: This participatory process showcases the adaptability and transparency of our system-led governance.

underground.headline: BCI Forums Backfire
underground.anchor_line: Forced confessions and public scoring rip open wounds at citywide assemblies—nothing is really 'open' under surveillance.
underground.contextual_reframing: People watch their identities get stripped or doubted in real time. The 'honesty scores' feel like another cage, not a bridge.

underground.headline: Restored Exposed Live
underground.anchor_line: Scores glitch, questions spread—restored citizens face public shaming when their memories don’t add up.
underground.contextual_reframing: Leaked system logs hint at identity tampering. Are some neighbors more 'algorithm' than human?

underground.headline: Official Record In Doubt
underground.anchor_line: Stories clash, tears spill, and Stenograd’s clean record gets messy—who decides what’s true when the machine edits our memories?
underground.contextual_reframing: Scrappy pirate streams are the only place people can argue back, as the Council’s ‘collective truth’ crumbles.
